restaurant.name: CosmoByte Diner
restaurant.description: An AI-driven culinary revolution located in the heart of Neo-Earth Station 7, Sector B. We welcome humans, cyborgs, and extraterrestrial travelers for a unique dining experience.

location.address: Inside the Nova Dome, next to the Starview Lounge, Neo-Earth Station 7, Sector B
location.directions: Walking distance from the Galactic Shuttle Terminal.

contact.reservation_info: For reservations, call us or book through our AI assistant on the website or our interactive holo-kiosk at the entrance.

restaurant.ambiance: A fusion of modern neon aesthetics, floating holograms, and a panoramic view of the Orion Nebula. Our booths offer adjustable gravity levels for a weightless dining experience.

chef.name: Chef Byte
chef.description: Our advanced AI chef using quantum cooking techniques and nanobot precision to create dishes that surpass traditional cuisine.

appetizers.name: Zero-Gravity Dumplings
appetizers.description: Delicate dumplings that float in mid-air before melting in your mouth, infused with anti-gravity spice from the Andromeda sector.

appetizers.name: Neon Plasma Bites
appetizers.description: Small glowing spheres bursting with sweet, sour, and umami flavors, sourced from rare exoplanet flora.

appetizers.name: Galactic Herb Salad
appetizers.description: A nutritious mix of hydroponically grown greens from Mars, tossed in a citrus dressing with micro-crystals of space salt.

main_courses.name: Nebula Noodles
main_courses.description: Hand-pulled noodles infused with deep-space fermented soy, served in a glowing broth inspired by the auroras of Jupiter.

main_courses.name: Photon Protein Stew
main_courses.description: A rich and hearty stew made with lab-grown protein, enhanced with a blend of interstellar spices and cosmic herbs.

main_courses.name: Quantum Quinoa Bowl
main_courses.description: A high-protein quinoa dish enriched with roasted asteroid beans and a fermented starfruit glaze.

main_courses.name: Cosmic Curry
main_courses.description: A slow-cooked blend of rare spices from across the Milky Way, delivering an explosion of intergalactic flavors.

main_courses.name: Galactic Gnocchi
main_courses.description: Soft potato dumplings, served in an anti-gravity plating experience, tossed in a starry tomato basil sauce with asteroid-aged cheese.

main_courses.name: Stellar Spaghetti
main_courses.description: Classic spaghetti made from hydroponic wheat, served in a slow-cooked exoplanet tomato sauce infused with quantum-aged garlic.

desserts.name: Astro-Crème Brûlée
desserts.description: A classic dessert with a plasma-torched caramel crust and vanilla custard infused with stardust.

desserts.name: Supernova Sorbet
desserts.description: A refreshing fusion of exotic frozen fruit extracts, served in a misty nitrogen haze.

desserts.name: Lunar Lava Cake
desserts.description: A rich, molten chocolate cake with a caramel core that erupts upon cutting, inspired by the volcanic moons of Io.

beverages.name: Quantum Fizz
beverages.description: A dynamic, color-changing cocktail with zero-gravity bubbles that dance in your glass.

beverages.name: Dark Matter Espresso
beverages.description: The densest and richest coffee in the universe, designed for the ultimate caffeine boost.

beverages.name: Anti-Gravity Smoothie
beverages.description: A levitating drink made from space-grown berries and nutrient-dense enzymes.

interactive_features: Holographic food demonstrations where Chef Byte virtually prepares your meal before your eyes.
Instant nutritional analysis of your meal, including calorie content and dietary recommendations.
Personalized flavor matching where our AI analyzes your taste preferences and suggests dishes you'll love.
